List package metadata

Source: R/meta_packages.R
meta_packages.Rd

List package metadata in an R universe.

Usage

meta_packages(repo = "https://multiverse.r-multiverse.org")

Arguments

repo

Character of length 1, URL of the package repository. R-multiverse uses "https://multiverse.r-multiverse.org".

Value

A data frame with one row per package and columns with package metadata.

Examples

meta_packages(repo = "https://wlandau.r-universe.dev")
